Name: RUN OR FIGHT
About the game: RUN OR FIGHT - it's an action filled game in which you will try to survive in dangerous environment filled with deadly traps, landmines, scorching fires and evil aliens! Make your way by using the alien weapon and your dash ability, but remember to plan your steps carefully. All levels in game are arenas with different goals to conquer each of them. Some of them requires solving puzzles, and in some of them you must destroy all your enemies. The game areas will add you some challenge as well. They have a very aggressive environment: lava fields, acid lake, hot geysers and so on. Be courageous and may you be victorious! Features: - artistic graphics. - cool soundtrack. - achievements. - hardcore gameplay. - and many traps.
